# title

**Instance Property**

The title text for the note.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var title: INSpeakableString? { get }
```

## Discussion

The title text represents the initial text that user’s see for the note.

## Getting the Note Content

- **content**: The main content of the note.
- **groupName**: The group that contains the note.

items.description: The main content of the note.
items.name: content

items.description: The group that contains the note.
items.name: groupName

title: title
